SEARCH
Package Boundary

Class CareerStaffCLI

java.lang.Object
Boundary.AbstractCLI
Boundary.CareerStaffCLI
public class CareerStaffCLI extends AbstractCLI
Boundary class for career center staff user interface. Provides functionality for staff to approve/reject company representative registrations, approve/reject internship opportunities, handle student withdrawal requests, and generate comprehensive reports with various filters.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen
